title: From ChatGPT to GameGPT: How AI Is Revolutionizing Game Design
description: Artificial Intelligence is transforming everything — from how we create art to how we play games. But one of the most fascinating revolutions happening today is inside the world of game design. title: Ledger Wants Its Latest Crypto Wallet to Take on Sam Altman's Eyeball-Scanning Orb
description: As artificial intelligence bots and deepfakes make it harder to tell who is real and who isn't, crypto firms are jockeying to sell potential solutions.
content: The internet is an increasingly murky space. A report from the generative voice platform Resemble AI indicates scammers stole $347.2 million via deepfakes in the second quarter of 2025 alone. Videos across the web show doctored footage of politicians... [3978 chars]

title: North Korea’s New Superpower: AI
description: Mysten Labs’ chief cryptographer warns that artificial intelligence, not quantum computing, poses the real near-term threat to blockchain security.
content:
There's a change coming to crypto crime, and North Korea's state-backed hackers are in the vanguard.
There's no longer any need for dozens of expensively educated programmers to analyze blockchain code and smart contracts for vulnerabilities, it's no... [5352 chars]
